field.name: establename
field.label: Select Table
field.description: Select a table from your Custom Tables list that will be used to display records

field.name: ct_pagelayout
field.label: Page Layout
field.description: Select a layout template for displaying the list of records

field.name: ct_itemlayout
field.label: Item Layout
field.description: Select a layout template for displaying individual records

field.name: eseditlayout
field.label: Edit Layout
field.description: Select a layout template for the record editing form

field.name: esdetailslayout
field.label: Details Layout
field.description: Select a layout template for displaying detailed record information

field.name: filter
field.label: Search Parameter
field.description:
Syntax: field_name operator value
Operators available: =, <, <=, >, >=, !=, == (exact match) Examples: - Simple filter: username=john - URL parameter: username=$get_user - Date filter: date={{ 'now'|date('Y-m-d') }} - Multiple conditions: age>18 AND status='active' - Format date parts: birthdate:%m%d

field.name: useridfield
field.label: COM_CUSTOMTABLES_MENU_CUSTOM_USERID_FIELD
field.description: Specify which field contains the user ID to filter records by ownership. Examples: - Simple: 'user_id' - With parent check: 'user_id or parents(children).user_id' Will show records owned by current user or where parent record is owned by current user.

field.name: recordstable
field.label: User Join Table
field.description: Specify the table that contains the relationship between users and records

field.name: recordsuseridfield
field.label: User Join User ID Field
field.description: Specify the field in the join table that contains the user ID reference

field.name: recordsfield
field.label: User Join Field
field.description: Specify the field that links records between the main table and join table

field.name: groupby
field.label: Group By
field.description: Specify field(s) to group results by. Examples: category, status, DATE(created_date)

field.name: sortby
field.label: Default sort by field
field.description: Specify the default sorting. Examples: title ASC, date DESC, name. 'ASC' is optional for ascending order

field.name: forcesortby
field.label: Forced sort by field
field.description: Specify mandatory sorting that users cannot override. Special fields: _id (record ID), _published (publish state). Example: DATE_FORMAT(birthdate,'%m%d') DESC

field.name: limit
field.label: Limit number of records per page

field.name: guestcanaddnew
field.label: Guest can add new records
field.option: Only registered can add new records

field.name: addusergroups
field.label: Who may add content
field.description: Select a user group that may add the records.

field.name: editusergroups
field.label: Who may edit content
field.description: Select a user group that may edit records.

field.name: publishusergroups
field.label: Who may publish records (Admin)
field.description: Select a user group that may publish/unpublish records.

field.name: deleteusergroups
field.label: Who may delete records
field.description: Select a user group that may delete records.

field.name: returnto
field.label: Custom Return To
field.description: Specify the URL to redirect after form submission. Use [fieldname] to include field values. Examples: /thank-you, /order/[order_id]/complete

field.name: msgitemissaved
field.label: Record Saved Message
field.description: Message to display after successfully saving a record

field.name: requiredlabel
field.label: Required Label
field.description: Symbol or text to mark required fields. Example: *, (Required), etc.

fieldset.name: email
fieldset.label: Email Notification
fieldset.description: Send email notification(s) after record has been added or edited.

field.name: onrecordaddsendemaillayout
field.label: Email Message Layout
field.description: Choose the layout type for the email message body creation.

field.name: onrecordaddsendemail
field.label: Send Email Under Conditions
field.description: Specify the condition for sending emails. For instance, contact forms may need to be sent when a website visitor adds a record. Note: Changes in the published status count as editing.
field.option: Based on specific conditions (Works on refresh too)

field.name: onrecordaddsendemailto
field.label: Send Email When Record is Added To:
field.description:
Enter the recipient email addresses for notifications when a record is added. Separate multiple emails with a comma.
To set a custom subject for an email, append the colon ':' after the email address, followed by the desired subject.
You can also utilize field values from the added record by using Twig tags.
Example 1: {{ email }} Example 2: test@yahoo.com, test@gmail.com, {{ email }}: My Test Email Example 3: {{ customeremail }}: Thank you {{ name }} for your participation.

field.name: onrecordsavesendemailto
field.label: Send Email When Record is Saved To:
field.description:
Enter the recipient email addresses for notifications when a record is saved or refreshed. Separate multiple emails with a comma.
To set a custom subject for an email, append the colon ':' after the email address, followed by the desired subject.
You can also utilize field values from the saved record by using Twig tags.
Example 1: {{ email }} Example 2: test@yahoo.com, test@gmail.com, {{ email }}: My Test Email Example 3: {{ customeremail }}: Thank you {{ name }} for your participation.

field.name: sendemailcondition
field.label: Conditions for Sending Email
field.description: Define conditions for sending emails. Examples: status='approved', amount>1000. Uses PHP comparison syntax

field.name: emailsentstatusfield
field.label: Field for Email Sent Status
field.description: Designate a field to track the status of email sending. This field should be of type 'integer' or 'checkbox'. '1' represents sent, '0' represents not sent.

field.name: allowcontentplugins
field.label: Allow Content Plugins
field.description: Let content plugins parse output content.

field.name: forceitemid
field.label: Force Itemid
field.description: Used to set parameters for edit form etc.

field.name: showcartitemsonly
field.label: Shopping Cart Only
field.description: Show Items in the Shopping Cart Only
